development.//icon: Path to an icon to be used for your executable. This is relative to the root of the finsemble-seed
development.//outputDirectory: Path where you would like the executable to be dumped. This is relative to the root of the finsemble-seed
development.//name: Name of your application. Will be used for the exe and windows metadata. Only alphanumeric characters, spaces, dashes(-), periods(.), and underscores(_) are allowed
development.name: xyz-dev
development.//companyName: Name of your company. Will be used for the name of the Windows start menu folder that contains the installed app.
development.//authors: The authors value for the nuget package metadata.
development.//companyName: Name of your company. Will be used for the name of the Windows start menu folder that contains the installed app.
development.//description: Description for your application. Used in the File description field of the exe properties.
development.//certificateFile: The path to an Authenticode Code Signing Certificate
development.//certificatePassword: The password to decrypt the certificate given in certificateFile
development.//signWithParams: Params to pass to signtool. Specifying a time server is recommended (e.g. '/tr http://timestamp.digicert.com'

production.//icon: Path to an icon to be used for your executable. This is relative to the root of the finsemble-seed
production.//outputDirectory: Path where you would like the executable to be dumped. This is relative to the root of the finsemble-seed
production.//name: Name of your application. Will be used for the exe and windows metadata. Only alphanumeric characters, spaces, dashes(-), periods(.), and underscores(_) are allowed
production.name: xyz-prod
production.//companyName: Name of your company. Will be used for the name of the Windows start menu folder that contains the installed app.
production.//authors: The authors value for the nuget package metadata.
production.//companyName: Name of your company. Will be used for the name of the Windows start menu folder that contains the installed app.
production.//description: Description for your application. Used in the File description field of the exe properties.
production.//certificateFile: The path to an Authenticode Code Signing Certificate
production.//certificatePassword: The password to decrypt the certificate given in certificateFile
production.//signWithParams: Params to pass to signtool. Specifying a time server is recommended (e.g. '/tr http://timestamp.digicert.com'
